verbs.description: rockets - spurs game 1 altercations [V: have] mike d'antoni seeing flashbacks of 2007 playoff melee monday night intimidation antics between the san antonio spurs and the houston rockets only brought back head coach mike d’antoni‘s scarring memories of his past playoff experiences most notably was a 2007 incident that saw the spurs’ robert horry get a two - game suspension after clotheslining mvp steve nash in the dying seconds of the fourth quarter … monday night intimidation antics between the san antonio spurs and the houston rockets only brought back head coach mike d’antoni‘s scarring memories of his past playoff experiences most notably was a 2007 incident that saw the spurs’ robert horry get a two - game suspension after clotheslining mvp steve nash in the dying seconds of the fourth quarter … d’antoni houston nene suns mike d’antoni‘s robert horry james harden mvp phoenix suns stoudemire mike dantonis rockets band dewayne dedmon san antonio spurs steve nash rockets dedmon at&t center boris diaw mike d'antoni patrick beverley mike dantoni
